backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, competitions, and result storage with comparison utilities and authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS setup defining design tokens, theming variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Utility that converts backend error messages into standardized user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for caching competitions, profiles, admin state, and results.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, root layout, route tree, and firstâ€‘time user profile setup handling.
Admin-only access wrapper that shows a permission check loader or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button managing auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard that blocks content and prompts login when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a clickable competition card showing name, status, dates, participant limit, and navigate-to details.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, conditional solve-flow UI, and footer.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table with ranks, icons, Ao5 times, and individual solve results.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Shows the user's profile name with inline editing and saving functionality.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a modal for new users to create a display name and submit their profile.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements the 15s inspection countdown with penalty/DNF handling before a solve.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a completion screen after all solves with navigation to leaderboard or competition page.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Handles the main solve timer with start/stop logic and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload prompt when enabled to warn users about leaving the page.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller's user profile once an actor is available and manages loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status.
Blocks browser back navigation when enabled by confirming before allowing navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for admin checks, profile operations, competitions, results, and attempt submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base theme setup defining color variables and global styles including dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Calculates average-of-5 scores handling DNFs and provides a leaderboard entry type.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into a short US date string.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds.milliseconds or DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Admin form for creating competitions, capturing metadata and scrambles, then submitting to the backend and navigating to the new competition.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays detailed competition info and allows starting, continuing, or viewing results based on user state.
Lists competitions grouped by status with loading handling and category sections.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Fetches competition data and results, computes Ao5 leaderboard entries with profiles, sorts them, and renders a leaderboard table or empty state.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the full solve workflow including inspection, solving, attempt submission, and transition between five attempts with navigation blocking.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event types, human-readable labels, and a default event constant.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, architecture notes, existing features, and system state for the speedcubing platform.
